TextView.android:text: 1.Patient/consumer identification(please complete or tick boxes below as appropriate)
Date and Time of Initial Observation:
3.Whether the person is Suffering from any Chronic Disorder?
5.H/O previous allergies/Drug Reactions,if any.If yes,please specify.
6.List of all ASU and H drugs used by the patient during the period of one month:
Any other relevant information associated with drug use:
7. List of other drugs used by the patient during the period of one month:
Any other relevant information associated with drug use:
8.Details of Drugs Suspect to cause ADR:
Consumed Orally along with()water/milk/honey/or any other:
whether any dietary precautions have been prescribed?: (if yes,please specify):
whether the drug is consumed under medical supervision or used as self medication:
Any other relevant information associated with drug use:
9.Management provided / taken for suspected adverse reaction
10.Please indicate outcome of the suspected adverse reaction(Tick Appropriate)
Reaction abated after drug stopped or dose reduced:
Reaction reappeared after re administration of drug:
Was the patient admitted to hospital? If yes, give name and address of hospital
11. Any abnormal findings of relevant laboratory investigations related to the episode done pre and post episode of ADR:
(Program Coordinator has to fill this scale)
1.Are there previous conclusive reports on the reactions?
2.Did the ADR appear after the suspected drug was administrative?
3.Did the ADR improve when the drug was dicontinued a specific atagonist was administered?
4.Did the adverse reaction reappear when the drug was re-administered?
5.Are there alternatives causes that could solely have caused the ADR?
6.Was the drug detected in the blood?(or other fluids)in a concentration known to be toxic?
7.Was the reaction more severe when the drug was increased,or less severe when the drug was decreased?
8.Did the patient have a similar reaction to the same or similar drug in any previous exposure?
9.Was the adverse event confirmed by the objective evidence?
